summary: Removes visual effects from going outside in daylight as a vampire.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Vampire No Sunlight Blur
Version: 1.0
Date: 7/11/2014
Category: Visuals and Graphics
Author(s): jdhogue (Nexus) aka LPShowboat0099 (Steam, elsewhere)

Description:
Removes the visual effects from going outside in daylight as a vampire.

Installation:
Manual:
1. Copy the .esp file to SkyrimData
2. Enable the .esp in your launcher or NMM or whatever.

NMM:
1. Activate the Mod

Steam:
1. Subscribe.
2. Load game launcher and allow it to download the mod.

Uninstall:
Manual:
1. Disable the .esp in your launcher or NMM or whatever.
2. Delete the .esp file from SkyrimData

NMM:
1. Disable the mod

Steam:
1. Unsubscribe via workshop.
2. Load the launcher and confirm .esp removal.
or
1. Delete from launcher and choose to unsubscribe.

History:
1.0, 07-11-2014 - Initial release.

Aliases, Contacts, Etc:
Nexus: jdhogue
Steam: LPShowboat0099
Email: comments@lpshowboat0099.com
Website: www.lpshowboat00099.com/Blog
YouTube: www.youtube.com/lpshowboat0099
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LPShowboat0099
Twitter: https://twitter.com/lpshowboat0099
G+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/100204208478237409506/100204208478237409506/posts

Thanks:
Thanks to Bethesda for making this wonderful, yet buggy, game and for allowing people to mod it to fit their needs. Also thanks to mod hosting services for allowing mods to be shared with others.

Legal
Pretty simple edit anyone can make in the Creation Kit, but I suppose this is required anyway.
Do whatever you want with this mod, just don't reupload it as-is and claim it as your own work.
author: JDHogue
